lang.item: The importer found multiple import data files. Please choose the one you wish to use.
If the software you're looking for doesn't appear above, please check to see if it is available for download at wedge.org. If it isn't, we may be able to write one for you - just ask us!
If you're having any other problems with this importer, don't hesitate to look for help on our forum.
The importer did not find any import data files. Please check to see if the one you want is available for download at wedge.org. If it isn't, we may be able to write one for you - just ask us!
After you download it, simply upload it into the same folder as this import.php file. If you're having any other problems with this importer, don't hesitate to look for help on our forum.
This importer was unable to find Wedge in the path you specified. Please double check the path, and that it is already installed there.

The importer detected that your host has open_basedir enabled on this server. Please ask your host to disable this setting or try moving the contents of your %s to the public html folder of your site.'
Unable to find the settings for %s. Please double check the path and try again.

The database password you entered was incorrect. Please make sure you are using the right password (for the Wedge user!) and try it again. If in doubt, use the password from Settings.php in the Wedge installation.
You must select at least one step to import.

Sorry, the database connection information used in the specified installation of Wedge cannot access the installation of %1. This may either mean that the installation doesn't exist, or that the MySQL account used does not have permissions to access it.

The error MySQL gave was: '

This importer assumes you have already installed Wedge and that your installation is working properly. It copies members, posts and other data from your "source" installation of %s into Wedge, so it won't work without an installation of Wedge.

All or some of the data in your installation of Wedge will be overwritten.
The importer should only need to know where the two installations are, after which it should be able to handle everything for itself.
This may be the right path.
You will need to change the value in this box.
If this is the wrong software, you can go back and pick a different data file.)
Congratulations, the importer has completed successfully. If you have or had any problems with this importer, or need help using Wedge, please feel free to look to us for support.
Please check this box to delete the importer right now for security reasons.
The importer has paused a few seconds to avoid overloading your server. Don't worry though, nothing's wrong.
Now that everything is imported, your Wedge installation should have all the data from the %s installation.
We hope you had a smooth transition!
Installation invalid, please double-check your path!
